meaningMnemonic: This <radical>building</radical> is full of <radical>car</radical>s because it's an <kanji>army camp</kanji>. The cars (and tanks and planes) need to be ready to go at any moment just like the soldiers.
readingMnemonic: All of the people in the <kanji>army camp</kanji> are wearing <reading>jean</reading>s (じん). You thought soldiers were supposed to wear uniforms, but it looks like when they're in the camp they have to wear jeans.
